Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil penalties for failure to maintain landmark or historic district improvements.

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 030020 PPK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the removal of the “community facility use only” restriction on property located 56th Street and 2nd Avenue Borough of Brooklyn, in Council District no. 38.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil penalties for failure to maintain landmark or historic district improvements.
